description: DNase-Hypersensitivity data for 16 macrophage sample(s). 20 run(s), 16 experiment(s), 16 alignment(s) on human genome GRCh38. Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2015. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20150820/homo_sapiens/README_dnaseseq_analysis_20150820
